daily_fact: Jamie Dimon expressed his willingness to support candidate Mamdani in the New York race, showcasing a spirit of collaboration and community engagement in local politics.
topline_md: A 76-year-old woman was tragically killed by a flying solar panel in NYC during a nor’easter, while power grid operators warned of potential blackouts next summer; additionally, the Chikungunya virus has been confirmed in NY, and NYC's transit system faces a significant budget gap.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
